channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: New: flake8-sarif-formatter (0)
item.description: A SARIF formatter for flake8
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pylint (0.2.1)
item.description: Flake8 plugin that runs PyLint.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-max-function-length (0.8)
item.description: A configurable flake8 plugin to enforce a maximum function/method length.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-stash (0.9)
item.description: A collection of flake8 checks.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-type-checking (2.4.2)
item.description: A flake8 plugin for managing type-checking imports & forward references
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-all-not-strings (0.0.1)
item.description: flake8 plugin which checks that modules under `__all__` are defined as strings
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-picky-parentheses (0.5.3)
item.description: flake8 plugin to nitpick about parenthesis, brackets, and braces

item.title: Updated: flake8-typing-imports (1.15)
